text: Austin Kirk Jenkins (born 5 July 1989, Lancaster, Pennsylvania) is an American professional wrestler. He is best known by his ring name, Adam Cole. Jenkins is currently signed to All Elite Wrestling. He is also known for his work in New Japan Pro Wrestling (NJPW), Ring of Honor (ROH), and the WWE. There he competed on the NXT brand and is a former NXT Tag Team Champion, the first ever NXT North American Champion and the longest reigning NXT Champion to date. ==Championships and accomplishments== * All Elite Wrestling ** Blind Eliminator Tag Team Tournament (2023) – with MJF ** Men’s Owen Hart Cup (2022) ** Dynamite Award (1 time) *** Biggest Surprise (2022) – * CBS Sports **
